nodes.title: Acid Dragon attacks Hero
nodes.description: You create the evil and vile acid dragon Mortano to attack the Hero.

outcomes.description: The Hero conqures the Acid Dragon Mortano and achieves new martial heights.

effects.resultText: The Hero vanquishes the Acid Dragon, a powerful strike sends the dragon to it's doom. Your victory gives the hero insight into the meaning of reality.

outcomes.description: The Hero conqures the Acid Dragon Mortano and achieves new exposive mastery.

outcomes.description: The Hero fails to conquer the dragon

effects.resultText: The Hero barely survives and has to spend long days recovering in an isolation healing cask.

nodes.description: You have a monster attack  the Heros aclhemy mentor and motivate them to never let anything like this happen again.

effects.resultText: The Hero's alchemy instructor dies sacrificing their life for the Hero. They are significantly inspired to improve.

effects.resultText: The Alchemy Master Edlund taught the Hero a complex recipe for glue. The Hero gains insight into mentorship.

effects.resultText: The Alchemy Master Edlund teaches the Master technique for crafting using blood mana technique.

nodes.title: Hero attempts to harmonize magic in all limbs
nodes.description: You create a magical wave that could vibrate in unison with the Heros limbs that could empower the Hero.

outcomes.description: The Hero successfully harmonizes the magical energy in their limbs

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully attunes with mana and grows significantly stronger. The Hero gains insight through experience.

outcomes.description: The Hero fails to harmonize with the magical energy and loses control.

effects.resultText: The Hero fails to attune. The lack of progress frustrates the Hero.

nodes.title: Hero's parents die tragically
nodes.description: Due to monster attack or accident the Hero's parents die, and motivate the Hero to not let this happen again.

outcomes.description: The Hero experiences this loss

effects.resultText: The Hero's parents die, leaving the Hero to grow alone, they vow to grow stronger.

nodes.title: Hero meets a martial mentor
nodes.description: You cause a martial mentor to take an interest in the Hero.

outcomes.description: The Hero meets an incredible fighter who vows to train them.

effects.resultText: The Hero meets an incredible fighter, Marcus, who vows to train them.

nodes.title: Hero meets an alchemy mentor
nodes.description: You cause an Alchemy mentor to take an interest in the Hero

outcomes.description: The Alchemist mentor vows to train the hero.

effects.resultText: The Hero meets the legendary alchemist Journegan.

nodes.title: Hero hosts a party
nodes.description: You cause the right combination of events to give the Hero a space to host a party and a group of people they could invite.

outcomes.description: The Hero successfully uses social

effects.resultText: The Hero hosts a life changing event and attendees talk about the incredible success of the event.

outcomes.description: The Hero successfully uses financial

effects.resultText: The Hero hosts a life changing event with gift bags that entice and attendees talk about the incredible success of the event.

outcomes.description: The Hero fails to use social

effects.resultText: The Hero's event is attended only by the very desperate.

nodes.title: Ice Dragon attacks Hero
nodes.description: You create the cunning and righteous ice dragon Graftin to attack the Hero.

outcomes.description: The Hero defeats the Ice Dragon Graftin in combat

effects.resultText: The Hero crushes the cunning Ice Dragon Graftin with a brutal strike and gains insight into battle.

outcomes.description: The Hero defeats the Ice Dragon Graftin through powerful anesthetic.

effects.resultText: The Hero subdues and kills the Ice Dragon Graftin using an anesthetic and gains insight into battle.

outcomes.description: The Hero defeats the Ice Dragon Graftin through asteroid magic.

effects.resultText: The Hero crushes the cunning Ice Dragon Graftin with asteroid magic and gains insight into battle.

outcomes.description: The Hero fails to defeat the Ice Dragon Graftin in combat

effects.resultText: The Hero barely survives and has to spend long days recovering in an isolation healing cask.

nodes.title: Hero investigates an assassination attempt
nodes.description: You cause an assassin to attack a noble near the Hero so they can investigate.

outcomes.description: The Hero successfully uses social

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully tracks down the assassin and determines their true motives. The assassin joins the Hero.

outcomes.description: The Hero successfully uses martial

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully tracks down the assassin and overpowers them to such a degree that the Assassin is impressed.  The assassin joins the Hero.

outcomes.description: The Hero fails to use social

effects.resultText: The Assassin escapes capture and embaresses the Hero.

nodes.title: Hero investigates forgeries
nodes.description: You empower a forger to create stunning forgeries near the Hero so they can investigate.

outcomes.description: The Hero successfully uses social

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully Tracks down the Forger and retrieves the original paintings for a profit and connections.

outcomes.description: The Hero fails to use social

effects.resultText: The Forger escapes capture and the Hero is declared a failure.

nodes.title: Hero investigates a jewelerie theft
nodes.description: You empower a cat thief to still priceless jewels near the Hero so they can investigate.

outcomes.description: The Hero successfully uses social

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully tracks down the art thief and retrieves the gems for a profit and connections.

outcomes.description: The Hero fails to use social

effects.resultText: The Art theif escapes capture, and mocks the Hero.

nodes.title: Hero investigates local crime
nodes.description: You empower a local crime ring near the Hero so they can investigate.

outcomes.description: The Hero successfully uses social

effects.resultText: The Hero disassembles the gangs crime ring and exposes corruption for profit and connections.

outcomes.description: The Hero fails to use social

effects.resultText: The Crime ring grows into human trafficking and becomes impossible to dismantle.

nodes.title: Hero investigates a smuggling ring
nodes.description: You empower a national smuggling ring so the Hero can investigate.

outcomes.description: The Hero successfully uses social

effects.resultText: The Hero successfully breaks the national smuggling ring and gains significant fame and acclaim.

outcomes.description: The Hero fails to use social

effects.resultText: The smuggling ring expands and becomes a criminal empire that mocks the Hero.

outcomes.description: The Hero lacks funding to turn a profit in a major corporation.

effects.resultText: The Hero lacks the funds and connections. the loss of profits frustrates the Hero.

outcomes.description: The Hero fails to purify the layline.

nodes.title: Magical mentor dies
nodes.description: You have a monster attack the Hero's magical mentor and motivate them to never let anything like this happen again.

outcomes.description: The Hero experiences this loss

effects.resultText: The Hero's Magical mentor dies in battle sacrificing their life for the Hero. They are significantly inspired to improve.

outcomes.description: The Hero fails to learn about the deep secrets and is closed off from the world

nodes.title: Magical mentor unlocks the Heros hidden strengths.

effects.resultText: The Hero was able to recognize their identity and unlock their own secret power and gain massive insight and magical power.

outcomes.description: The Hero fails to unlock their secret powers and is eternally closed off from the world.

effects.resultText: The Hero's secret power is kept from them. They are frustrated by the delay.
